attributes.action: create an independent swimming pools inspector to ensure correct sanitation throughout the uk pools and leisure centers by imposing fines and publishing an annual public report .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Throught the nation swimming pools new and old are constantly being left to ruin and fester as lifeguards over the years have replaced dedicated cleaners who wanted to clean rather than trained skilled lifeguards made to do a job they are not wanting to do ! We the public are the sufferers. Not only is swimming a fantastic leisure activity it is the best form of exercise and could save the NHS millions of pounds if it were to encourage cleanliness in these pools which in turn would see many swimmers return to the pools no doubt.
